timeline.bodyText: maybe the available values in ENUM_PROPERTY_NAMING_TYPE could be listed automatically, so the comment will not be outdated
timeline.author: macjohnny

timeline.bodyText: maybe you would want to add a test for the non-original case, too?
timeline.author: macjohnny

timeline.message: Add enumPropertyNaming option to typescript generators
Use actual enum values in an error message, instead of hardcoding them
Add tests for "UPPERCASE" and "snake_case" enum var namings
Add tests for "UPPERCASE" and "snake_case" enum var namings
